Description: Two ragged fragments of undyed linen cloth (medium-coarse quality), both with part of selvedge fringe. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.22 ends per 10mm and weft c.7 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Cloth has a distinctly early feel. High proportion of warp to weft threads, lots of splicing, and the threads are all very distinct. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1992]
